MyService API Documentation

Welcome to the official documentation for MyService API. Here you will find all the information you need to integrate with our services.

Authentication

To use the MyService API, you need an API key. You can get one from your dashboard.

All API requests must be made over HTTPS. Calls made over plain HTTP will fail. API requests without authentication will also fail.


curl -X GET "https://api.myservice.com/v1/users" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY"

Core Endpoints

GET /users

Retrieves a list of users. Supports pagination.

POST /users

Creates a new user.

GET /users/{id}

Retrieves a specific user by their ID.

Error Handling

MyService API uses conventional HTTP response codes to indicate the success or failure of an API request. For more details, see the error codes section.

Rate Limiting

We enforce rate limits to ensure fair usage. See our rate limiting guide for more information.
